Title: Establishes the police canine vest fund
Summary: Establishes the police canine vest fund to be used for the purpose of purchasing, maintaining, repairing and replacing soft body ballistic armor vests and other protective equipment for state police and municipal department police canines utilized in the performance of police duties, as well as the purchasing and training of such police canines.
LawCode: Add ยง97-bbbbb, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the police canine vest fund
